text: Monroe Heath (March 27, 1827 - October 21, 1894) was an American politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois from 1876 to 1879. He was a member of the Republican Party. Heath was born on March 27, 1827 in Grafton, New Hampshire. Heath died on October 21, 1894 in Asheville, North Carolina from a stroke, aged 67. ==Other websites== * Category:1827 births Category:1894 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Burials at Oak Woods Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Monroe Heath
